plays.text: Penalty to Cory Cross 2 minutes for Holding Brad Isbister

Goal scored by Mats Sundin assisted by Shayne Corson
Penalty to Darren Van Impe 2 minutes for Roughing Paul Healey
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Crosschecking Shayne Corson
Penalty to Shayne Corson 10 minutes for Attempt to Injure Dave Scatchard
